thread.title: Tonight Show Momentarily Taken Over by Trump News Network
thread.title_full: Tonight Show Momentarily Taken Over by Trump News Network

title: Tonight Show Momentarily Taken Over by Trump News Network

organizations.name: real housewives of beverly hills recap
nick cannon threatens to sue national enquirer
miami-dade county corrections & rehabilitation boot camp
trump news network share on facebook tweet

text:
For a brief moment Tuesday’s episode of the Tonight Show was taken over by a live stream of the newest 24-hour news source Trumps News Network with a message from lead anchor and sole news maker President Trump (Jimmy Fallon). Among the stories covered that you won’t see in the fake lame street media were Trump’s golf score and a Godzilla related incident in Finland that definitely happened. Trump also called on his Education Secretary and woman-who-definitely-stared-at-the-sun-too-long Betsy Devos (comedian Jo Firestone ) to fill in as the don’t-call-her-a-meteorologist “weatherman.” Strangely it was Devos’s report on sunny days ahead we had the most trouble believing.
